content: if you are looking for a summer crochet scarf this is it this summer crochet scarf is the perfect pattern if you are a beginner and you want to learn how to crochet a lace stitch that looks gorgeous and is not very hard to crochet the pattern only uses two stitches single_crochet and double_crochet the size of the summer crochet scarf 180 cm/ 71 inches- wingspan and 82 cm/32 inches- depth from center for my summer crochet scarf top i ve used 350 g 7 x 50 g cotton yarn and a 3 5 mm crochet hook
